data.lyric:
[ti:Finesse (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Finesse - Drake
[00:00.51]Producer：Noel
[00:01.02]Yeah turn everything up
[00:07.70]Yeah oh yeah
[00:14.91]Turn everything up a little more
[00:20.70]I want my baby to have your eyes
[00:24.40]I'm going against my own advice
[00:28.18]Should I do New York
[00:29.67]I can't decide
[00:32.08]Fashion week is more your thing than mine
[00:35.76]I can't even lie I'd rather stay inside
[00:40.54]I can't do suit and tie
[00:43.30]Can't be in a room with you and stand on different sides
[00:48.28]One thing at a time
[00:50.64]I have to learn to hide
[00:53.54]One thing at a time
[00:55.70]Emotions running high
[00:58.09]I wish you felt alright
[01:00.32]Just hitting my line
[01:03.55]All the time all the time all the
[01:11.20]You stay on my mind
[01:13.66]All the time all the time yeah
[01:21.85]It takes some finesse
[01:26.94]I seen you finesse
[01:31.90]He can't know finesse
[01:39.00]You stay on my mind
[01:42.77]You and your sister
[01:45.13]Too hot to handle
[01:47.76]Things would get cancelled
[01:50.28]I would make time for you
[01:53.50]Commitment
[01:55.44]Going the distance
[01:57.79]I'm new to all of this
[02:02.29]It takes some finesse
[02:07.25]I seen you finesse
[02:12.38]He can't know finesse
[02:19.46]You stay on my mind
data.trans:
[ti:Finesse (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.51]//
[00:01.02]让一切都嗨起来
[00:07.70]//
[00:14.91]让一切都再嗨一点
[00:20.70]我想要我的宝贝引起你的主意
[00:24.40]我要自相矛盾
[00:28.18]我该走纽约风吗
[00:29.67]我无法决定
[00:32.08]时装周和你的关系更大
[00:35.76]我无法撒谎 我宁愿闭口不言
[00:40.54]我不能穿西装 打领带
[00:43.30]无法忍受和你在一个房间 却站在不同的两边
[00:48.28]一个一个来
[00:50.64]我要学会隐藏
[00:53.54]一个一个来
[00:55.70]情绪越来越激动
[00:58.09]我希望你没事
[01:00.32]触碰我的底线
[01:03.55]总是这样 总是这样
[01:11.20]你徘徊在我脑海
[01:13.66]总是这样 总是这样
[01:21.85]需要使点手段
[01:26.94]我见识了你的手段
[01:31.90]他无法理解什么是手段
[01:39.00]你徘徊在我脑海
[01:42.77]你和你的妹妹
[01:45.13]太火辣了 我搞不定
[01:47.76]约会取消吧
[01:50.28]我会为你腾出时间的
[01:53.50]保证
[01:55.44]到远方
[01:57.79]对于这一切 我是个新手
[02:02.29]需要使点手段
[02:07.25]我见识了你的手段
[02:12.38]他无法理解什么是手段
[02:19.46]你徘徊在我脑海
